```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(showtext)
library(ggtext)
library(lubridate)
library(viridis)
library(ggplot2)


lep<- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karolo89/Raw_Data/main/Limited_English_Proficiency.csv")

summary(lep)

```

```{r}
summary(lep)
```
```{r}
lep_long <- lep%>%
  pivot_longer(c("Spanish", "Russian","Other_Slavic","Other_Indic","Other_Indo_European","Chinese","Japanese", "Korean", "Mon_Khmer_Cambodian", "Laotian", "Vietnamese", "Other_Asian","Tagalog", "Other_Pacific_Island","Arabic","African"),
               names_to= "Languages",
    values_to = "Count",
    values_drop_na = TRUE)

lep_long <- lep_long[,-c(1:4)]
```


```{r}
lang <-lep %>%
  group_by(Geography, "Spanish", "Russian","Other_Slavic","Other_Indic","Other_Indo_European","Chinese","Japanese", "Korean", "Mon_Khmer_Cambodian", "Laotian", "Vietnamese", "Other_Asian","Tagalog", "Other_Pacific_Island","Arabic","African") %>%
  summarise(count= n())
```
